TopicTitle: Orbit lines and maneuver nodes are in the wrong place (1.4.3, linux)

Articles.Content:
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1hXbl7hPghPyirbs7z8XXclGFC74YIjbD

What is correct is that the actual orbit is clickable.

What is incorrect:

  • the visual orbit line is not aligned with the actual orbit.
  • the maneuver node "trails" the mouse pointer
  • on some zoom levels the orbit lines is invisible, it appears again when zooming in or out

 

The issue dissapears if you zoom out further but sometimes you want to be zoomed in.
